paragraphs.text: CIA interrogations report: Feinstein offers aid and comfort to enemy, stabs heroes, allies in the back.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: Programing Alert
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Author Ralph Peters will be a guest on Fox News Channel's "Hannity" on December 9 at 10pm ET
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: Tuesday's willful, unnecessary and gratuitously destructive release of the one-sided "torture report" at the insistence of outgoing Senate Intelligence Committee Chairwoman Dianne Feinstein, D-Calif.(backed by the White House) amounts to nothing less than providing aid and comfort to the enemy in wartime
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Can anyone cite one practical good accomplished by releasing this gratuitously destructive report at this time?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will revealing successful practices make us more secure?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: The report provides a propaganda windfall for Islamist fanatics
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will it benefit our allies?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: No
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: It exposes those who took great risks to help us in the wake of 9/11
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will it "set the record straight?"
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: No
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: It distorts the record grotesquely in the interests of political correctness, blame-shifting and short-term political advantage
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Over the decades, I've respected Senator Feinstein, even when disagreeing with her
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Thus
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: I'm far more shocked by her self-serving release of this report than by anything the CIA did to protect us
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: One can only conclude that the senator and her acolytes are attempting not to reform our intelligence practices but to re-write their own role in what transpired
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The senator and her colleagues (from both parties) were briefed in detail on every activity field agents took to protect us from further attacks
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The senator and her colleagues (as well as the Department of Justice) approved every one of those practices
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Now
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the senator's saying,"Even if we knew, we didn't know."
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Perhaps she is, indeed, suffering a much-delayed attack of conscience
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the awareness that the incoming Republican-majority Congress would never release such a biased report surely plays a role
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And is it an accident that the report's release--the stuff of commanding headlines--has been timed for the day that Professor "Americans-are-stupid" Jonathan Gruber testifies on Capitol Hill about ObamaCare?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: What a monstrous betrayal it is to compromise our agents and our allies just to shove a lackey's testimony below the fold in tomorrow-morning's newspapers
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As for those supposedly horrendous actions taken by CIA personnel to convince blood-encrusted terrorists that cooperation might be the wisest course, they may have been harsh
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the times and our enemies were and are immeasurably harsher
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But torture?
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: What the Islamic State and its ilk do to their captives is torture
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They shrink from nothing
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We shrink from the thought of a terrorist gasping for breath
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Senator Feinstein and her supporters argue that the American people have a "right to know,"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: they don't know the American people
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Living too long in a bubble with fellow members of the cultural elite, they have no sense of how the average American feels about terrorists
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: who fly passenger aircraft into skyscrapers
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: or
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: who gleefully behead innocent captives in video clips
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Far from
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: being mortified by water-boarding or sleep deprivation
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: (for
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: working Americans sleep
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: deprivation is a normal state of affairs from holding down two jobs and multiple shifts to feed their families during the Reign of Obama)
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the folks I know back home in the Pennsylvania coal towns would skin terrorists alive then get out the salt shaker
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: My people weren't upset by water-boarding
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: They were upset-- infuriated-- by the collapse of the Twin Towers and the deaths of 3,000 Americans
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Of course
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the release of this report just now-- which may lead to the deaths of more Americans, as the senator has been warned-- is another sign of the Obama administration's desperation
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Team Obama's genius for failure in every policy field, foreign or domestic, has left the administration's inner circle frantic to deflect attention from its parade of deceptions, derelictions and disasters
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: About the only thing left to them is to exhume, yet again, the mutilated-by-the-left corpse of the George W  Bush administration
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For Team Obama, with its conviction that America's at the root of every evil, Bush is responsible for the Crucifixion, the Black Death, the Holocaust and Country music
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But the average Americans so disdained by this White House(and by Professor Gruber) want to know what President Obama has done for them
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: And
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: unless
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: one belongs to an arcane interest group
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the answer is "Nothing."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Even if
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: we grant her the noblest intentions
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Senator Feinstein has betrayed our country and its defenders
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Will she accept responsibility for the aftermath of this report's release?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The president certainly won't
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Should things go wrong
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the White House will give the senator a back-massage by a bus this holiday season
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Our enemies would gladly exterminate every man, woman and child in the United States
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Senator Feinstein just handed them a gift
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But the president wrapped it
paragraphs.label: assumption
